OrderItemUsageRsrcGrant.name: OrderItemUsageRsrcGrant
OrderItemUsageRsrcGrant.description: Represents the negotiated grants for the usage resource that's associated with the usage product added in the order item.

GrantQuantity.description: The granted or negotiated quantity of a usage resource associated with the usage product.

GrantType.description: Specifies the type of model that defines how the usage resource is consumed.

Name.description: The auto-generated identifier for the order item usage resource grant record. For example, OIURG-00004 or OIURG-4567.

OrderItemId.description: The order item associated with the usage product.

ProductUsageGrantId.description: The product usage grant associated with the order item.

TokenResourceId.description: The usage resource of category Token associated with the usage resource related to the usage product added in the order item.

UsageGrantRefreshPolicyId.description: The usage grant refresh policy associated with the usage resource related to the usage product added in the order item.

UsageGrantRolloverPolicyId.description: The usage grant rollover policy associated with the usage resource related to the usage product added in the order item.

UsageResourceId.description: The usage resource associated with the usage product that's added in the order item.

ValidityPeriodTerm.description: The duration for which the usage resource grant is valid, when used with the validity period units.

ValidityPeriodUnit.description: The length of a validity period for the usage resource grant, when used with the validity period term.
